Subskills.name: Stronger Explosives
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt by explosive kunai.

Subskills.name: Packed Up Kunai
Subskills.description: Increases kunai explosion area of effect radius.

Subskills.name: Doubleforking Kunai
Subskills.description: Explosive kunai split an additional time dealing increased damage each time they split.

Subskills.name: Satisfaction
Subskills.description: Decreases the mana cost of explosive kunai.

Subskills.name: Split Up
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to split into additional kunais.

Subskills.name: Willful Sacrifice
Subskills.description: Now consumes a percentage of your maximum life each cast giving your kunai increased speed and explosion aoe. Maximum life damage is non-lethal.

Subskills.name: First Is Best
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt and explosion area of effect radius kunai.

Subskills.name: Ronin's Curse
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict arcane break on hit.

Subskills.name: Little Slicers
Subskills.description: Explosive kunai no longer explode but instead pierces with increased projectile speed slicing monsters inflicting bleeding.

Subskills.name: Doubleblast
Subskills.description: Chance on hit for the kunai to explode an additional time.

Subskills.name: Bouncy Kunai
Subskills.description: Kunais have a chance to bounce off of terrain and stun monsters on hit.

Subskills.name: Concussive Explosions
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to stunned targets.

Subskills.name: Penetration Volley
Subskills.description: Throw a spread of piercing kunai that explode on each enemy hit.

Subskills.name: Chainsplosions
Subskills.description: Split kunais chain on the first enemy hit exploding on each enemy chained to.
